xxl.core.io
Class JavaFilesystemOperations

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.JavaFilesystemOperations
All Implemented Interfaces:
FilesystemOperations
public class JavaFilesystemOperations
extends Object
implements FilesystemOperations

This class implements the interface FilesystemOperations with normal Java method calls.

See Also:
BlockFileContainer, MultiBlockContainer

Field Summary
protected  int bufferBlockSize
          For buffering (MODE_BUFFERED): size of the blocks in the buffer (initially 512).
protected  int bufferNumberOfBlocks
          For buffering (MODE_BUFFERED): number of blocks in the buffer (initially 8).
static FilesystemOperations DEFAULT_INSTANCE
          The default Java implementation of the FilesystemOperation interface.
protected  int mode
          Mode currently used.
static int MODE_BUFFERED
          Mode constant: Each file is opened using a {link xxl.core.io.BufferedRandomAccessFile}.
static int MODE_NORMAL
          Mode constant: Using normal Java operations.
static int MODE_UNBUFFERED
          Mode constant: Each file is opened with "rws"-mode (synchronized).
static FilesystemOperations UNBUFFERED_DEFAULT_INSTANCE
          The default Java implementation of the FilesystemOperation interface for unbuffered io.

          Constructs a FilesystemOperations instance in the normal mode.

          Constructs a FilesystemOperations instance in the specified mode.
JavaFilesystemOperations(int mode, int bufferBlockSize, int bufferNumberOfBlocks)
          Constructs a FilesystemOperations instance using BufferedRandomAccessFiles.

          Opens a file and returns a RandomAccessFile.

Constructor Detail

JavaFilesystemOperations

public JavaFilesystemOperations(int mode,
                                int bufferBlockSize,
                                int bufferNumberOfBlocks)
Constructs a FilesystemOperations instance using BufferedRandomAccessFiles.

Parameters:
mode - mode of the RandomAccessFiles (MODE_NORMAL, MODE_UNBUFFERED, MODE_BUFFERED). Here only MODE_BUFFERED is allowed.
bufferBlockSize - size of the blocks in the buffer.
bufferNumberOfBlocks - number of blocks in the buffer.

JavaFilesystemOperations

public JavaFilesystemOperations(int mode)
Constructs a FilesystemOperations instance in the specified mode.

Parameters:
mode - mode of the RandomAccessFiles (MODE_NORMAL, MODE_UNBUFFERED, MODE_BUFFERED).

JavaFilesystemOperations

public JavaFilesystemOperations()
Constructs a FilesystemOperations instance in the normal mode.

Method Detail

openFile

public RandomAccessFile openFile(String fileName,
                                 String mode)
Opens a file and returns a RandomAccessFile.

Specified by:
openFile in interface FilesystemOperations
Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file.
mode - the access mode ("r" or "rw").
Returns:
the new RandomAccessFile or null, if the operation was not successful.

fileExists

public boolean fileExists(String fileName)
Determines if a file exists or not.

Specified by:
fileExists in interface FilesystemOperations
Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file to be checked.
Returns:
true iff the file exists.

                          String newName)
Renames the name of a file to a new name.

Specified by:
renameFile in interface FilesystemOperations
Parameters:
oldName - the old name of the file.
newName - the new name of the file.
Returns:
true iff the file exists.

Deletes a file.

Specified by:

Returns:
